entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as the one who has an Invisi-bility Cloak and a Marauder's Map in his trunk. He is also described as being quick.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as being ready to leave with Hagrid at least five minutes before Hermione. He is also described as clicking his tongue impatiently and needing to crouch under the Invisi-bility Cloak.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as hurrying back down from the girls' dormitories wearing a scarf, gloves, and one of her own knobbly elf hats. She is also described as saying 'Well, it's cold out there!' defensively.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is mentioned as someone they need to check the map for signs of.

entities.name: mrs. norris
entities.description: Mrs. Norris is mentioned as someone they need to check the map for signs of.

entities.name: nearly headless nick
entities.description: Nearly Headless Nick is mentioned as gliding along absentmindedly humming something that sounded horribly like 'Weasley Is Our King.'

entities.name: weasley
entities.description: The Weasleys are mentioned in the song 'Weasley Is Our King' that Nearly Headless Nick is humming.

entities.name: invisi-bility cloak
entities.description: The Invisi-bility Cloak is mentioned as something Hagrid fetched from his trunk.

entities.name: marauder's map
entities.description: The Marauder's Map is mentioned as something Hagrid fetched from his trunk.
